00023 /*
00024  * num_setup_options - parse the command line arguments
00025  */
00026 void
00027 num_setup_options(int argc, char ** argv)
00028 {
00029         int              c;
00030 
00031         g_num_profiles_fn = tw_vector_create(sizeof(char), 255);
00032 
00033         // should make the log file an input option
00034         // log file has day, agent_id, type_id, throughput, desired_throughput, failures
00035         g_num_log_fn = tw_vector_create(sizeof(char), 255);
00036         sprintf(g_num_log_fn, "%s/num.log", g_rn_logs_dir);
00037 
00038         printf("\nNetwork User Specified Input Parameters: \n\n");
00039 
00040         opterr = 0;
00041         optind = 0;
00042         while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "-P:U:B:")) != -1)
00043         {
00044                 switch(c)
00045                 {
00046                         case 'P':
00047                                 strcpy(g_num_profiles_fn, optarg);
00048                                 printf("\t%-50s %11s\n", 
00049                                         "Network User Profile", 
00050                                         g_num_profiles_fn);
00051                                 break;
00052                         case 'U':
00053                                 g_num_mod = atoi(optarg);
00054 
00055                                 printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", 
00056                                         "Reporting Interval", 
00057                                         g_num_mod);
00058                                 break;
00059                         case 'B':
00060                                 if (strcmp(optarg,"NUM") == 0)
00061                                 {
00062                                         g_num_debug = 1;
00063                                         printf("\tNUM Reporting throughput for first non-type 0 agent.\n");
00064                                 }
00065                                 else
00066                                         g_num_debug = 0;
00067                                 break;
00068                         default: ;
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 
00072         if(0 == strcmp(g_num_profiles_fn, ""))
00073                 sprintf(g_num_profiles_fn, "tools/%s/profile.txt", g_rn_tools_dir);
00074 
00075 }
